title:
The <1>ecosystem
of <3>MoonRise transforms technology into independence.
description: Each product was created with purpose: to provide real infrastructure, direct control, and financial freedom. Everything interconnected, without relying on third parties.
moonplus: Dedicated infrastructure for tokenization and trading of real-world assets. Real estate, contracts, and regulated integrations with on-chain liquidity via MNR. Built to unite physical capital with digital assets under institutional security.
mnr: Native token of the MoonRise ecosystem. The foundation of all infrastructure and the economy â€” with burn mechanisms, protection against manipulation, and controlled strategic distribution. It is the sovereign currency that sustains every operation of the empire.
transparency: Total real-time transparency: independent audits, smart locks, and official wallets visible on-chain. All MasterVault transfers are public, immutable, and auditable. Nothing is hidden, everything can be verified.
moonwallet: Self-custody multi-chain wallet designed for executors. Automatic MNR import, send/receive, and seamless real-time connection with dApps. Simple yet powerful interface with integrated buy button for easy operation.
moonbank: Digital bank connected to the MoonRise ecosystem. Fast payments, account with card, and native crypto integration in just a few clicks. Every transaction strengthens the liquidity cycle, bringing speed and autonomy to the user.

cta.subtitle: The entire MoonRise infrastructure evolves in a cycle of execution and reinvestment.
